Title: Requires the chief administrator of the office of court administration to establish a searchable public database providing information regarding eviction proceedings in the state
Summary: Requires the chief administrator of the office of court administration to establish a searchable public database providing information regarding eviction proceedings in the state; directs the chief administrator to adopt rules directing village, town or other local courts to report their eviction proceeding data to the office of court administration.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to requiring the office of court administration to establish a searchable public database providing information regarding eviction proceedings in the state
